autoreconnectrf.name: AutoReconnect
message.autoreconnectrf.installYacl: Install Yet Another Config Lib to access mod options
option.autoreconnectrf.attempts.infinite: Whether to repeat reconnecting with the last configured delay.
option.autoreconnectrf.conditions.type.t:
%s: Only reconnect if at least one condition matches.
%s: Only reconnect if no conditions match.
option.autoreconnectrf.conditions.keys.t:
Keys to check against the disconnect reason key, to determine whether to reconnect.

Last disconnect reason key:
%s
option.autoreconnectrf.conditions.patter:
Regex patterns to check against the disconnect reason string, to determine whether to reconnect.

Last disconnect reason string:
%s
option.autoreconnectrf.messages.tooltip: Messages to send after a successful automatic reconnect.
option.autoreconnectrf.messages.instance: Single AutoMessages object for a specific world, server or realm.
Name of the singleplayer world, server entry or realm.
Delay between messages and before the first one, in milliseconds.
Messages or commands to be sent after automatically reconnecting.
